name: masochist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
psychology
  specialized a person who gets sexual pleasure from being hurt or controlled by another person: He was a voyeur and a masochist. I'm not a masochist who wants to be bullied. Compare
sadist
informal a person who enjoys an activity or situation that most people would find very unpleasant: I may be a masochist, taking on all this work, but I like the challenge. Cyclists may be the sports world's greatest masochists. See
masochism
More examplesFewer examplesThey were masochists who went to kinky sex clubs.Her preference is for running the marathon, described as a race for masochists.You have to be a masochist to enjoy drag racing.
